name: Maraith

ability.name: Messenger Of Death
ability.description:
Can be ridden.
Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description: It relishes the peculiar scent living things give off when they are near death. If a Mariath has taken a liking to you. It is safe to assume that is why.

skills.name: Ignis Blast
skills.description: Hurls a ball of fire straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: Flare Arrow
skills.description: Fires three flaming arrows in succession that home in on an enemy.

skills.name: Shadow Burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: Spirit Flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: Nightmare Ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Dark Laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
